item.title: (b) ODE - Homogenous
item.description: 1. 상미분제차차방정식 $$ y''+ay'+by=0 $$$$ D^2+aD+b=0 $$ 2. 서로 다른, 실수 해 $$ D=\alpha,\beta $$$$ y=c_1e^{\alpha x}+c_2e^{\beta x} $$ example1) $$ y''-y'-2y'=0 $$ sol $$ \left(D-2\right)\left(D+1\right)=0\rightarrow D=-1,2 $$ $$ y=c_1e^{-1x}+c_2e^{2x} $$ example2) $$ y''-4y'=0 $$ sol $$ D\left(D-4\right)=0\rightarrow D=0,4 $$ $$ y=c_1+c_2e^{4x} $$ 2. 중근 $$ D=\alpha $$$$ y=\left(c_1+c_2x\right)e^{\alpha x} $$ example1) $$ y''+6y'+9y=0 $$ sol $$ \left(D+3\right)^2=0 \rightarrow D=-3 $$ $$ y=\left(c_1+c_2x\right)e^{-3x} $$ 3. 서로 다른, 복소수 해 $$ D=\alpha\pm i\beta $$$$ y=e^{\alpha x}\left(c_1\cos\beta x+c_2\sin\beta x\right) $$$$ y=e^{\alpha x}\left(c_1e^{+i\beta x}+c_2e^{-i\beta x}\right) $$ example1)

item.title: (b) CEE - Homogenous
item.description: 1. 코시-오일러 제차미분방정식 형태1 $$ x^2y''+axy'+by=0 $$$$ D^2+\left(a-1\right)D+b=0 $$ 형태2 $$ xy^{\prime}+ay=0 $$$$ D+a=0 $$ 2. 서로 다른, 실수 해 $$ D=\alpha,\beta $$$$ y=c_1x^{\alpha}+c_2x^{\beta} $$ example1) $$ x^2y''-4xy'+6y=0 $$ sol $$ \left(D-3\right)\left(D-2\right)=0\rightarrow D=3,2 $$ $$ y=c_1x^3+c_2x^2 $$ example2) $$ x^2y''-xy'-y=0 $$ sol $$ D^2-2D-1=0\rightarrow D=1\pm\sqrt{2} $$ $$ y=c_1x^{1+\sqrt{2}}+c_2x^{1-\sqrt{2}} $$ example3) $$ xy''-y'=0 $$ sol $$ D\left(D-2\right)=0\rightarrow D=2,0 $$ $$ y=c_1x^2+c_2 $$ example4)
